title: Docker Requirements
search: true
execute:
  echo: false
  output: asis
---

Specify which Docker commands should be run during setup.

### Example

```yaml
setup:
  - type: docker
    build_args: [ GITHUB_PAT=hello_world ]
    run: [ git clone ... ]
    add: [ "http://foo.bar ." ]
    copy: [ "http://foo.bar ." ]
    resources: 
      - resource.txt /path/to/resource.txt

```
